name: paia
body:
The **Patrons Account Information API (PAIA)** is a HTTP based programming
interface to access library patron information, such as loans, reservations,
and fees.

The preliminary specification of PAIA is managed in a git repository at 
http://github.com/gbv/paia. Feel free to comment, raise issues and
modify the text until it will be released as PAIA 1.0. A snapshot in HTML
format is made available from time to time at this page.

## How to contribute

* Implement PAIA!
* Formulate the specification!

The master file `paia.md` is written in
[Pandoc Markdown](http://johnmacfarlane.net/pandoc/demo/example9/pandocs-markdown.html)
which can be converted to HTML and other formats (see `Makefile`).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
